item.title: Added RSS feed
item.description: First RSS that I write manually, no generation, no PHP, no servlet, no JSP no nothing, just editing with gedit. Yes. Let's only automate what needs automation.

item.title: Added slides
item.description: The presentations I have done up to here, why deprive the world of such art?
